Subject: JMX importUri not causing more crawling

I'm using the importURI JMX call to add sites to a running job.  I've
wrapp=
ed the cmdline-jmxclient in a perl script which depending on the
level of a=
ctivity, adds more URL's to the job.  The problem is, the
threads don't see=
m to actually crawl the newly added URL's.  I'm using
the BdbFrontier and P=
athScrope.  I'm limiting the host-based queue's
to 200 URL's, and the Front=
ier queue's are all exhausted.  But I'm
setting the forceFetch to true and =
I'd be very surprised if every
single newly added URL would sort into an ex=
isting exhausted queue.

Is there something I can do or someway to reconfig=
ure the crawler so
that I can add URL's to a running job and have them craw=
led?

Thanks in advance.

-matt
